def solution(n, d):
    return [int(c) for c in str(n)[-d:]] if d > 0 else []

def solution(n,d):
    return list(map(int, list(str(n)[-d:]))) if d > 0 else []

def solution(n,d):
    return [int(s) for s in str(n)[-d:]] if d > 0 else []

def solution(n,l):
    return [] if l<=0 else [int(d) for d in str(n)][-l:]

def solution(n, d):
    return [int(i) for i in str(n)[-d:]] if d > 0 else []

def solution(n,d):
    return [] if d<=0 else [int(c) for c in str(n)[-d:]]

def solution(n,d):
    return [int(i) for i in str(n)][::-1][:d][::-1] if d > 0 else []
